OPPO A3s, F9, and F9 Pro prices in India slashed by up to Rs 2,000

The OPPO F9 and F9 Pro prices have been slashed by Rs 2,000 and the two now retail for starting prices of Rs 16,990 and Rs 21,990, respectively.

Dec 19 2018 By Ashish Kumar
OPPO F9 gets a permanent price cut in India Oct 09 2018 By Ravi Sharma
OPPO F9 to go on sale in India on September 15th, priced at Rs 19,990

The F9 sports a 6.3-inch display with Waterdrop notch and a screen to body ratio of 90.8 percent

Sep 13 2018 By Ashish Kumar
OPPO F9 soft-pink colour variant spotted on TENAA; launch expected soon

The OPPO F9 comes with a tiny notched-display and a Gorilla Glass 6 protection on top

Aug 27 2018 By Ashish Kumar
OPPO F9 vs Honor Play: taking the competition in the mid-range a notch above

The F9 comes with OPPO s ingenious waterdrop notch design and premium glass-sandwich design as compared to Honor Play s conventional metal-clad construction

Aug 25 2018 By Abhiman Biswas
